Posts.Content: ducky113 wrote: I have seasonal allergies and noticed that when they come on, my arm LE flares up. I also had some LE flare up with a cold this past winter. Is anyone else's LE affected by a cold or allergy? Any recommendation on what OTC medications would be best and not add to the LE? Posts.Content: Oct 16, 2014 03:11PM ducky113 wrote: Hi Caeser! That happened to me too. I looked like Uncle Fester from the Adam's family.Â It almost came on out of nowhere and lasted for a few weeks. You should return to normal soon. It most likely is coming from the chemo and any steroids they are giving you with it.
